name: Head in midline (supine)
instruction: Child lies on the back and keeps head aligned in midline.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates head alignment but cannot maintain.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Maintains briefly or with visible instability.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Maintains steadily in midline.

name: Hands to midline (supine)
instruction: Child brings both hands toward midline while supine.

criteria_0_to_3.0: No purposeful hand movement toward midline.
criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but does not reach midline.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Brings hands to midline smoothly and symmetrically.

name: Pelvic lift (bridge)
instruction: Child lifts pelvis off the surface while lying on the back.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates lift but minimal clearance or stops.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Lifts pelvis clearly and maintains briefly with control.

name: Roll supine to side
instruction: Child rolls from back onto side independently.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates roll but does not complete.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes roll smoothly and independently.

name: Roll supine to prone
instruction: Child rolls from back to belly independently.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but cannot complete to prone.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Rolls to prone smoothly without assistance.

name: Pull to sit (from supine)
instruction: Child transitions from lying on back to sitting using own effort (minimal external cue).

criteria_0_to_3.2: Completes with compensations or light assistance.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Transitions to sit independently with head/trunk control.

name: Prone on elbows
instruction: Child lies on belly and props on forearms.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Props steadily with head up and trunk control.

name: Prone press-up (on hands)
instruction: Child pushes up from prone to supported on hands with elbows extended.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Achieves partial extension or brief support.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Supports on extended arms with control.

name: Roll prone to supine
instruction: Child rolls from belly to back independently.

criteria_0_to_3.0: No attempt to roll to supine.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Rolls smoothly without assistance.

name: Prone pivot / reach
instruction: In prone, child pivots or reaches to one side while maintaining support.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Shifts weight and reaches with good control.

name: Transition prone to sitting
instruction: Child moves from prone (belly) to sitting position.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Completes with compensations or light assistance.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Transitions independently with control.

name: Supine to long sitting
instruction: Child moves from supine to long sitting (legs forward).

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but cannot complete without help.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes independently with controlled trunk.

name: Sitting with trunk support
instruction: Child sits with external support at trunk/hips.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Sits with light support but unstable.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Sits upright with minimal support.

name: Sitting without support
instruction: Child sits independently without using hands for support.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Sits steadily with upright posture.

name: Reach forward in sitting
instruction: While sitting, child reaches forward and returns without falling.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Reaches with instability or uses one hand for support.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Reaches and returns with good control.

name: Reach to side in sitting
instruction: While sitting, child reaches to side and returns.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes smoothly both sides (as applicable).

name: Turn head/trunk in sitting
instruction: While sitting, child turns to look over shoulder and returns.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Turns and returns with stable sitting balance.

name: Pick up object from floor (sitting)
instruction: From sitting, child bends to pick up an object from the floor and returns.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Picks up with instability or partial return.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Picks up and returns to sitting with control.

name: Sitting to hands-and-knees
instruction: Child transitions from sitting to quadruped (hands-and-knees).

criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes independently with control.

name: Sit to stand
instruction: Child rises from sitting to standing.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but needs major assistance or stops early.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Stands with compensations/uses hands or multiple attempts.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Stands up independently with controlled extension.

name: Floor sit to stand
instruction: Child rises from floor sitting to standing.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Completes with compensations (e.g., pushing on thighs/furniture).
criteria_0_to_3.3: Stands from floor independently with control.

name: Kneeling to sitting
instruction: Child transitions from kneeling to sitting in a controlled manner.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes independently and smoothly.

name: Sit with reduced base of support
instruction: Child sits with a reduced base of support (e.g., feet not firmly planted) and maintains balance.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Maintains steady balance without hand support.

name: Move legs over object (sitting)
instruction: While sitting, child lifts/moves legs to clear a small obstacle (one/both).

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but cannot clear without help.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Clears with control and minimal trunk compensation.

name: Hold quadruped
instruction: Child holds hands-and-knees position with weight through hands and knees.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Holds steadily with good alignment.

name: Reach in quadruped
instruction: From quadruped, child reaches with one hand and returns without collapsing.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Reaches and returns with controlled weight shift.

name: Crawl forward (short distance)
instruction: Child crawls forward a short distance using arms and legs.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Crawls with reciprocal pattern and control.

name: Crawl and turn
instruction: Child crawls and changes direction (turns) while maintaining movement.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Turns smoothly maintaining crawl.

name: Move to kneeling
instruction: Child transitions from floor to kneeling (low or high kneel).

criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes independently with control.

name: Hold low kneeling
instruction: Child maintains low kneeling with trunk upright.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Holds steadily with upright trunk.

name: Hold high kneeling
instruction: Child maintains high kneeling (hips extended, trunk upright).

criteria_0_to_3.3: Holds steadily without hand support.

name: Walk forward in high kneeling
instruction: Child moves forward in high kneeling for a short distance.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but cannot progress without help.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Moves forward with control and rhythm.

name: Move to half-kneeling
instruction: Child transitions from kneeling to half-kneeling (one foot forward).

criteria_0_to_3.3: Achieves half-kneel independently with control.

name: Hold half-kneeling
instruction: Child maintains half-kneeling without external support.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Holds steadily, trunk upright.

name: Half-kneel to stand
instruction: Child rises from half-kneeling to standing.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Stands independently with controlled extension.

name: Creep/crawl over low obstacle
instruction: Child creeps/crawls over a low obstacle while maintaining forward movement.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but needs help to clear.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Clears smoothly with control.

name: Stand with support
instruction: Child stands using external support (hands or furniture).

criteria_0_to_3.2: Stands with light support but unstable.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Stands with minimal support and upright posture.

name: Stand without support
instruction: Child stands independently without holding on.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Stands independently but unstable/uses arm strategies.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Stands steadily with good alignment.

name: Reach forward in standing
instruction: While standing, child reaches forward and returns without stepping/falling.

criteria_0_to_3.0: Cannot reach without loss of balance.
criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates reach but needs support/steps immediately.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Reaches and returns with controlled balance.

name: Reach to side in standing
instruction: While standing, child reaches laterally and returns.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but needs support or steps.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes with good control without stepping.

name: Pick up object from floor (standing)
instruction: Child bends to pick up an object from the floor and returns to standing.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Picks up with instability or uses hands on legs/support.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Picks up and returns without external support.

name: Step forward and back
instruction: From standing, child steps forward and returns to start.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but needs support or cannot return.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Steps forward and back with controlled balance.

name: Step over low object
instruction: Child steps over a low obstacle while standing/walking slowly.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Clears smoothly without contact and maintains balance.

name: Turn 180 degrees
instruction: Child turns around (approximately 180 degrees) in standing.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but stops or needs assistance.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Turns independently but unstable/multiple steps with loss of control.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Turns independently with good balance control.

name: Single-leg stand (brief)
instruction: Child briefly lifts one foot and maintains balance (as able).

criteria_0_to_3.1: Lifts foot momentarily but immediately steps down.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Maintains with controlled posture for the set brief duration.

name: Partial squat
instruction: Child performs a partial squat and returns to standing.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but needs support or cannot return.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes with good alignment and controlled return.

name: Kneel to stand
instruction: Child rises from kneeling (or half-kneel) to standing.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Stands independently with controlled extension.

name: Stand on step/platform
instruction: Child stands on a low step/platform maintaining balance.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Stands steadily without support.

name: Walk forward (short distance)
instruction: Child walks forward a short distance independently (as able).

criteria_0_to_3.1: Walks with major assistance or very unstable.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Walks independently with stable rhythm.

name: Walk and turn
instruction: Child walks and performs a turn while maintaining balance.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Turns independently but unstable or multiple corrective steps.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Turns smoothly without loss of balance.

name: Walk backward
instruction: Child walks backward a short distance.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but needs support or stops quickly.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Walks backward with controlled steps and balance.

name: Walk sideways
instruction: Child takes sideways steps in both directions (as able).

criteria_0_to_3.3: Steps sideways with control and symmetry.

name: Step up (low step)
instruction: Child steps up onto a low step with one foot and brings the other up (as able).

criteria_0_to_3.1: Steps up only with major support.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Steps up independently but uses compensations/hand support.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Steps up independently with controlled movement.

name: Step down (low step)
instruction: Child steps down from a low step with control.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Steps down independently but unstable/poor control.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Steps down independently with controlled descent.

name: Climb stairs up
instruction: Child climbs up several steps (with or without railing, as per protocol).

criteria_0_to_3.2: Climbs independently but uses compensations/rail heavily.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Climbs with controlled pattern and minimal compensations.

name: Climb stairs down
instruction: Child descends several steps with control.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Descends independently but unstable/uses rail heavily.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Descends with controlled pattern and balance.

name: Run (short distance)
instruction: Child runs a short distance at own best effort.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Fast walk; no clear flight phase.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Runs with clear flight phase and rhythm.

name: Start/stop quickly
instruction: Child starts moving quickly and stops with control.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but needs support or loses balance.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Performs with instability or delayed control.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Starts and stops with good control.

name: Jump forward (two feet)
instruction: Child jumps forward with both feet together.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Clear jump but unstable landing or limited distance.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Clear flight and stable landing with symmetry.

name: Jump down (from low step)
instruction: Child jumps down from a low step and lands safely.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Steps down or needs major support.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Jumps down but unstable landing/uses hands.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Jumps down with controlled landing.

name: Hop (one foot)
instruction: Child hops on one foot (as able).

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but no clear hop/loses balance.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Performs a hop with instability/limited repetitions.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Hops with clear flight and controlled landing.

name: Jump over line/low marker
instruction: Child jumps over a line or low marker with two feet.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Attempts but contacts marker or loses balance.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Clears with stable, symmetric landing.

name: Kick ball (standing)
instruction: Child kicks a ball while standing without losing balance (as able).

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but needs support or loses balance.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Kicks with reduced control/steps to recover.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Kicks with controlled single-leg support and recovery.

name: Walk along a line
instruction: Child walks placing feet along a line (narrow base).

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but requires support/steps off immediately.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Walks with frequent corrections/steps off line.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Walks with good control and minimal deviations.

name: Walk while carrying an object
instruction: Child walks forward while carrying a light object in hands.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but needs support or drops object quickly.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Walks independently but unstable or frequent pauses.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Walks steadily while carrying without loss of balance.

name: Walk fast
instruction: Child walks at a fast pace without running.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Walks fast with controlled rhythm and balance.

name: Lift one leg (supine)
instruction: Child lifts one leg off the surface while supine.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Lifts with good selective control.

name: Bring knees up (supine)
instruction: Child flexes hips/knees bringing knees toward trunk while supine.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes smoothly with control.

name: Lift head in prone
instruction: Child lifts head in prone and maintains briefly.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Maintains steadily with good control.

name: Weight shift in prone support
instruction: In prone support, child shifts weight side-to-side without collapsing.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Shifts smoothly with control.

name: Prone to quadruped
instruction: Child transitions from prone to hands-and-knees.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes independently.

name: Sitting to kneeling
instruction: Child transitions from sitting to kneeling.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes independently with control.

name: React to mild perturbation (sitting)
instruction: While sitting, child maintains balance with a mild external perturbation or challenge (standardized in your protocol).

criteria_0_to_3.3: Recovers quickly with good control.

name: Move/shift position in sitting
instruction: Child shifts position in sitting (e.g., scoot) while staying upright.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Shifts smoothly with control.

name: Sitting to prone
instruction: Child transitions from sitting down to prone (controlled).

criteria_0_to_3.3: Completes independently with controlled descent.

name: Hold long sitting
instruction: Child holds long sitting with upright trunk.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Holds steadily with upright posture.

name: Sit cross-legged (as able)
instruction: Child sits cross-legged and maintains balance.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Holds steadily without hand support.

name: Transfer between surfaces (sitting)
instruction: Child transfers from one sitting surface to another (e.g., bench to chair) with control.

criteria_0_to_3.2: Transfers independently but unstable/uses hands heavily.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Transfers independently with good control.

name: Sit to stand (no hands)
instruction: Child rises from sitting to standing without using hands.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates but cannot stand without help.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Stands without hands with controlled extension.

name: Kneel-walk and turn
instruction: Child moves in high kneeling and changes direction.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Turns smoothly with control.

name: Move along surface (kneeling or supported)
instruction: Child moves along a stable surface while kneeling or partially supported (standardize in your protocol).

criteria_0_to_3.3: Moves with control and steady progression.

name: Stand to sit (controlled)
instruction: Child lowers from standing to sitting with control.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Lowers independently with controlled descent.

name: Walk over obstacles (series)
instruction: Child walks over a short series of low obstacles without stopping.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Clears only with major assistance/stops each time.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Clears smoothly without contact, steady rhythm.

name: Run 10 meters
instruction: Child runs 10 meters at best effort.

criteria_0_to_3.0: Unable to run or cannot complete distance.
criteria_0_to_3.1: Fast walk; no clear flight phase.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Runs with reduced coordination/limited flight phase.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Runs with clear flight phase and stable rhythm.

name: Jump in place (two feet)
instruction: Child jumps up and down in place with both feet together.

criteria_0_to_3.3: Clear jump with stable, symmetric landing.

name: Repeated hops (one foot)
instruction: Child performs repeated hops on one foot (as able).

criteria_0_to_3.1: Single minimal hop or immediate loss of balance.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Multiple hops with controlled rhythm and landing.
